There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Toyota Bedfordview.

attributes.description:
The 2019 Mazda Mazda 1.5 Active Manual  is a luxury, solid and practical hatchback. This Mazda offers commendable value for money. It has the following extras: Electric Windows, air-conditioning, a full service history, Bluetooth and much much more. 

Autotops situated in George 23 York street our friendly sales team will assist you in all enquiries we offer in house finance and deliver nationwide . Trade-ins are welcome.

At Autotops we thrive through the earned loyalty of our clients, friends, and family. We function as a team, work ethically, and remain focused on exceeding expectations of our customers. Our customers buy dreams, and we strive to make them great.

attributes.description: At Kia Silverlakes we pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check, roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles are delivered with a full service history and are accident free. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Family and family look after each other. We will tailor make a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you to test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. CALL NOW and you could be driving off in the car of yours dreams.
